help.description: To get help on all supported commands, or a specified command

directory.description:
Set or get the current directory for the FullStack-Lesson-Plans. 
 ie - 'directory /Users/username/Fullstack-Lesson-Plans' 
 tip: get the directory by finding the folder in terminal and typing 'pwd'

week.description: Type week to see what the current week is set to. Type 'week 5' to set to week 5.

day.description: Type day to see what the current day is set to. Type 'day 5' to set to day 5.

activity.description: returns a folder for a certain act

fullOrPart.description: Set or get the full or part time schedule. Type fullOrPart to get the currently set schedule. Type fullOrPart full to set to fulltime.

addUser.description: Add a user to verified users. Example: addUser U5UQLA3GV
